text: @realDonaldTrump Glad I found you here,your Arkansas Beverly Hillbillies GOP just bumped me off trying to tell Twitter not to listen to MAGA “Herdsmen “whatever,to take Malaria Medicine or any quack cures for coronavirus.Also,of his racist B.S.,I know of no white women shot to death in bed by👮🏼‍♀️
